name: DOUBLE MAZE
description:
DOUBLE MAZE

Double Maze is the combination of classic maze game and platformers .

In this game you control two robots both with their own abilities , at the same time.

Both of them are in a maze and your duty is to take them to their portals  before the timer in the middle ends.

Controls:

Run - Right and Left Arrow Keys

Jump/Go Up - Up Arrow Key

Go Down - Down Arrow Key [only for Flying Robot]

Goal:

Your goal is to find your way in a maze and take both of the robots to their poratls before the timer in the middle goes down to zero.

Both the sides of maze are different from each other so you have to find the shortest and easiest path to complete the game in time.
